title: Climate Futures Tasmania (CFT) climate data
description: A set of 19 bioclimatic variables, calculated according to the WorldClim method.
external_description: See Climate Futures for Tasmania: climate modelling. Antarctic Climate and Ecosystems Cooperative Research Centre, Hobart, Tasmania
attribution: Corney, S. P., J. J. Katzfey, J. L. McGregor, M. R. Grose, J. C. Bennett, C. J. White, G. K. Holz, S. Gaynor, and N. L. Bindoff, 2010: Climate Futures for Tasmania: climate modelling. Antarctic Climate and Ecosystems Cooperative Research Centre, Hobart, Tasmania.
